title: The most affordable digital cameras by average price
summary: This chart shows the Average of price at the from Camera Memoto to Konica .
\\n From the chart we see that the Average of price were 75.9 , at their highest in Cambo .

gold: The graph shows the average price of digital cameras by brand . You can see that Konica has the lowest average price , averaging at £ 54 , Hunten is a little bit higher coming in at £ 58 . Sigma is a little higher again , coming in at £ 62 ; Then a bit more of a jump to £ 70 for Memoto and the most expensive , £ 76 average for Cambo cameras .
